summary: This document is a series of email exchanges from June to December 2023 between legal professionals, primarily concerning coordination and information sharing regarding an investigation into Leon Black. The communications reference a new victim, a potential conflict with the SDNY, and seek to compare information with prior investigations into Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: The central subject of a legal investigation discussed in the emails, with a new victim coming forward.

persons.name: Jeanne Christensen
persons.context: Identified as the attorney for a victim. The correspondents seek her permission to share details of their investigation.

persons.name: Jeanne
persons.context: Referenced in discussions about obtaining permission to share investigation details; likely a shorthand for Jeanne Christensen.

connections.description: Jeanne Christensen is identified as the attorney for a victim in the Leon Black investigation.
Legal professionals coordinating an investigation, discussing conflicts with the SDNY and sharing information.
One correspondent states they have spoken with Jeanne Christensen and she gave permission to share investigation details.

events.title: Email follow-up regarding trial and Leon Black investigation
events.description: An email sent apologizing for a late response due to being on trial, offering to discuss the Leon Black case by phone.

events.title: Scheduled call about Leon Black investigation
events.description: An email arranging a phone call to discuss the Leon Black investigation.

events.title: Discussion of victim's attorney and information sharing
events.description: Email correspondence confirms contact with victim's attorney Jeanne Christensen and discusses obtaining permission to share detailed allegations.

keyFacts: A new victim has come forward in a case against financier Leon Black, prompting a renewed investigation.
The investigators are seeking to compare information from this new case with prior investigations into Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The victim's attorney is identified as Jeanne Christensen, and her permission is being sought to share detailed allegations.
There is a noted conflict or coordination issue with the Southern District of New York (SDNY) regarding the investigation.
The correspondence shows active coordination and scheduling between legal professionals from June through December 2023 to discuss the case.
